name: brvdif
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpbiran(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, universe, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wbr(c0, universe, c2)
-| wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, universe, c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wbr(c0, universe, c2)
-| wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, universe, c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2))))

|- wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, universe, c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2))))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, universe, c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2))))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cdif(universe, c1), c2), wn(wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

comment: Binary relation with universal complement is the negation of the relation. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 1-Jul-2018.)
